application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Second Floor Flat, 60 Cadogan Square, LONDON, SW1X 0EE
description: Details required by Condition 5 (Details - fireplace) of Listed Building Consent LB/12/05149 (Internal refurbishments and renovations.  Removal of limited number of internal timber stud work and plasterboard partitions. Removal of lowered ceilings and reconstruction.  Fit bathrooms and kitchen. Remove modern cornicing and replace with cornice matched to an original found in ceiling void. Lay timber flooring with acoustic underlay and overlay. Install new electrical layout. Remove modern fireplace and replace with marble fireplace. Replace three modern doors)
